name: Quest for the Cure
description:
Made for the RPG Maker Jam #3.

Play as Gregory, a man in search of the cure to his disease. In this game HP is not given freely, it is a resource to be managed. As you wander the world, the disease will gradually take its toll and Gregory will lose HP.

There are two "good" endings and two "bad" endings. The "bad" endings bring you to a game over screen, just so you know.

I have a short list of Hints if you need them.

The game is short but I hope you will enjoy it. And keep an eye out for secrets!
